channel.title: CVE Feed for i-plug inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for i-plug inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32988|2024-08-02T02:27:53.227Z -- i-plug%20inc. -- %27offerbox%27%20app%20for%20android
item.description: 'OfferBox' App for Android versions 2.0.0 to 2.3.17 and 'OfferBox' App for iOS versions 2.1.7 to 2.6.14 use a hard-coded secret key for JWT. Secret key for JWT may be retrieved if the application binary is reverse-engineered.

item.title: CVE-2024-32988|2024-06-04T17:51:23.187Z -- i-plug%20inc. -- %27offerbox%27%20app%20for%20android
item.description: 'OfferBox' App for Android versions 2.0.0 to 2.3.17 and 'OfferBox' App for iOS versions 2.1.7 to 2.6.14 use a hard-coded secret key for JWT. Secret key for JWT may be retrieved if the application binary is reverse-engineered.
